project.heading: Website Design and Development
project.brief:
Objective:

To design and develop a four-page website consisting of a homepage, about/how it works page, contact page, and terms and conditions (TCs) page. The website will feature modern design elements.

Scope of Work:

  1. Homepage:
    • Image Carousel: Implement an image carousel at the top, cycling through a collection of images with overlay text and call-to-action buttons as needed.
    • Intro Text Section Include introductory text accompanied by icons.
    • Image Carousel/Scroller Add an image carousel or scroller for product screenshots (app images). Note that having two carousels may impact performance; we can explore using an image scroller instead.
    • App Features List the app features below the app images section.
    • Contact Section: Include a "Get in Touch" section leading to a contact form and social media icons.
  2. About/How It Works Page:
    • Hero Video Section: Feature a hero video with call-to-action buttons.
    • Text Section: Provide a section for compliance and other relevant information.
    • Contact Section: Include a contact section.
  3. Contact Page:
    • Hero Image Section: Feature a hero image with accompanying text.
    • Contact Form Section: Include a contact form, additional text, and social media icons.
  4. Terms and Conditions (TCs) Page:
    • Provide a section for detailed terms and conditions text.
  5. General Requirements:
    • Ensure all sections are editable via the CMS.
    • Store all content in a version-controlled system using markdown text files, ensuring flexibility in CMS choice without affecting the website.
    • The client will provide images and select icons to be used throughout the website.
    • Follow existing color schemes and fonts.

Deliverables:

  • A four-page website including a homepage, about/how it works page, contact page, and TCs page.
  • Image carousel, text sections, video sections, and contact forms as specified.
  • Version-controlled content in markdown text files.
  • Integration of client-provided images and selected icons.
  • Adherence to existing color schemes and fonts.

This project aims to deliver a modern, user-friendly website that effectively showcases the client's product and information while providing easy content management and flexibility.
